name: Sleep
description: The two boys sleep peacefully.  The only time they are not bickering.
status: Personal collection, not available for sale.

name: Sleeping Cat
description: Paddy is a Kitty adopted by Iris.  In here he sleeps in a corner peacefully.
status: Commission work, not available for sale.

name: Land and Lake
description: This painting is made in collaboration with the artist's children, aged 6 and 9 at that time.

name: Dear John
description: Commission work for Mr John.  This painting is a snapshot of John's presence during the time of interaction with the artist.  He drank tea and read insights about software engineering best practices.
status: Commission work, not available for sale.

name: Splash
description: It's a luxury to jump in the pool in the sweltering heat of Singapore!
